verses.content: Chuongchun, Israel chihai po po chu Hebrona David kuomah an hung a, “Ngai ta, i ru le i tisahai kan na.
Kha hmaa Saula kan chunga ân lal laia Israelhai ṭhuoi suok le ṭhuoi lûttu i ni hlak a; chun, LALPA chun i kuomah, ‘Ka mi Israelhai chu châwm i ta, Israelhai chungah hotuin um i tih,’ a tih a,” an ta.

Chuongchun, Israel upahai po po chu Hebrona chun lal kuomah an va feh a; chun, lal David chun Hebrona chun LALPA hmaah an kuomah thu a thlung a, chun, David chu Israelhai chunga lal dingin hriek an nâl a.
David chu ân lal tîr lai chun kum sâwmthum mi a na, kum sâwmli sûng ân lal a.
Hebrona chun Judahai chungah kum sari le thla ruk ân lal a; chun, Jerusalemah Israelhai le Judahai po po chungah kum sâwmthum le kum thum ân lal a.

Chun, lal le a mihai chu chu rama chêng Jebus mihai chu rûn dingin Jerusalemah an feh a; chuonghai chun David a hung lût thei naw ringin David kuomah, “Hitaka hin hung lût naw tawp i tih, mitdel le kebaihaiin lo dang an ti che,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, David chun Zion kul chu a lâk a, chu chu David khuo chu a nih.

Chun, David chun chu ni chun, “Jebus mihai thawtu taphawt chu tuiluongnaah hang fe hai sienla, David theidatu mitdel le kebai chu that raw hai se,” a ta. Chuongchun, “Mitdel le kebai chu ina chun lût naw nihai,” an ti hlak a.
Chun, David chu kula chun a um a, David khuo tiin ân bûk tah a. Chun, David chun Milloa inthawkin a vêlin kul a siem a, a sûngtieng leh.
Chuongchun, David chu a hung ropui ta deu deu a, LALPA, sipaihai Pathien chu a kuoma a um pei leiin.
Chun, Tura lal Hiram chun David kuomah mi a tir a, sidar thinghai a thawn a, themthiemhai le lung suttuhai a tir bawk a, David ta ding chun in an bâwlpêk a.
Chun, David chun LALPAIN Israelhai chungah lalah ama chu a sukdet a, a mi Israelhai leiin a ram chu a chawimawi a nih ti a hriet tah a.
Chun, David chun Hebron a suoksan hnungin Jerusalema chun thaikêm le nuhmei a nei belsah a; chuongchun, David chun naupasal- hai le naunuhmeihai a la nei sa ta rawp a.
Chun, Jerusalema a neihai hming chu hieng hi an nih; Sammua, Sobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elisua, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elisama, Eliada, le Eliphelet hai hi an nih.

Philistin mihai chun David chu Israelhaiin lala um dingin hriek an nâl ti an hrietin Philistin mihai po po chu David zawng ding chun an hang fe tah a; David chun chu chu a lo hrietin a kulbînga chun a feh a.
Chun, Philistin mihai chu an hung a, Rephaim ruoma chun an inzar a.

Chun, David chun, “Philistin mihai thaw dingin kan hang fe ding am a nih? ka kuta hin anni chu pêng i ti?” tiin LALPA a rawn a. LALPA chun David kuoma chun, “Hang fe rawh, Philistin mihai chu i kutah ka pêk ngei ngei ding a nih,” a ta.

Chuongchun, David chu Baal- perazima chun a feh a, chutaka chun David chun anni chu a hneh a, “LALPAIN ka hmêlmahai chu tuiting inṭhe ang elin ka hmaah a mi sukdarpêk tah,” a ta. Chuleiin, chu hmun hming ding chun Baal-perazim ân bûk a.
Chutaka chun Philistin mihai chun an milimhai an mâksan a, David le a mihai chun an lâk a.
Chun, Philistin mihai chu an hang fe nâwk a, Rephaim ruoma chun an inzar nâwk a.
Chun, Davidin LALPA a hang rawn chun, ama chun, “Hang fe naw rawh, an hnungtieng fe huol la, thingtheihmi kûng zâwna khin hang thaw rawh.
Chun, thingtheihmi kûng lêra fe ri ṭhup ṭhup ang i hriet pha chun châng rawh, Philistin sipaihai thaw dingin i hmaah LALPA a suok tah tina nîng a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, LALPAIN thu a pêk angin David chun a thawh a, Philistin mihai chu Gebaa inthawka Gezer chenin a that a.
